frontmatter.author: Mona Eltahawy
frontmatter.title: Many people say that they support a woman's right to choose to wear the niqab because it's her natural right. But what they're doing is supporting an ideology that does not believe in a woman's right to do anything except cover her face.

frontmatter.author: Edward Snowden
frontmatter.title: Your rights matter, because you never know when you are going to need them.
